name: TekGer
0:
”Alexa turn on living room light.”
”Alexa turn off kitchen light.”
”Alexa set office light to 40 percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is intended only for TekGer customers with LCN Smart Devices on their homes or facilities. You need to create an account on our system at https://admin.tekger.com with the same email as the one you use to log into Alexa. TekGer Skill allows you to control your LCN smart Switches and Relays using your voice. You can contact us at info@tekger.com for more information or to help you to set up your account. Once the skill is installed just click on Discover Devices so the skill can retrieve the list of all your installed devices. Once this is done you can start controlling your devices with your voice.
